name: Entomophobia (itch) (VuVuu Inc.)
description:
ENTOMOPHOBIA

A top-down Roguelite Bullethell where you kill thousands of Insects/Bugs! Get up to 5 Automatic firing Weapons, and a Controllable Weapon too. Slay Bugs, Get Upgrades, and Kill More. Pick from 3 Upgrade Cards on Level Up, choose correctly may your choice bring great damage and glory.

CURRENT MAPS:

- The Fields
- The Warehouse

PERMANENT UPGRADES:

- Speed (up to 25% increase)- Max Health (up to 50% increase)
- Health Regen (up to .5 per sec)
- Stamina Regen (up to 1 per sec)
- Max Stamina (up to +125 stamina)

CHARACTERS

RON


- starts with fly swatter
- base speed and health

DEBRA


- starts with salt shotgun
- faster with less health

CLETUS


- starts with bug zapper weapon
- slower but tankier

AGNES


- starts with bug spray grenades
- slowish and little higher base health

Weapons
  • - Fly Swatter
  • - Lemon Disks
  • - Bug Spray
  • - Bug Zapper
  • - Scythe
  • - Newspaper
  • - Arrows
  • - Glue Launcher
  • - Saw Blades
  • - Timbs
  • - Chains
  • - Grenade
  • - Oddly Large Fish Stick
  • - Big Scissor
  • - Corn Flake
  • - Singular Waffle Square
  • - Peanut Launcher
  • - Bird Call
Guns
  • - Revolver
  • - Ak-47
  • - Micro Uzi

Solo developed game, I've been working on since February of 2022.

The game was initially released on Steam.
